status.description: Processing status of the request (success, error, or partial completion)

code.description: Error code identifier for programmatic handling

field.description: Specific field that triggered the error

severity.description: Error severity level (critical error or advisory warning)

errors.description: List of errors encountered during processing, null if no errors

name.description: Standardized skill name with normalized terminology

proficiency.description: Skill proficiency level based on experience and competency

skillType.description: Categorizes skill as technical (hard) or interpersonal (soft)

skills.description: Prioritized skills relevant to target role (max 14 distinct skills)

strengths.description: Effective aspects of the skills presentation and selection

areas_to_improve.description: Suggestions to enhance skills relevance to target role

feedback.description: Evaluation of skills selection and alignment with job requirements

data.description: Container for optimized skills and evaluation feedback
